rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C181164

self.title: CDISC CDASH Study Agent Dechallenge Reaction Response Terminology

definition: A terminology codelist relevant to the resultant reaction due to withdrawing, interrupting, or otherwise altering administration of study treatment.
name: Study Agent Dechallenge Reaction Response
preferredTerm: CDISC CDASH Study Agent Dechallenge Reaction Response Terminology

terms.definition: Continued presence of an adverse event after decrease or change in dose, or withdrawal of the product/drug.
The outcome of decreasing the dose or discontinuation of the product/drug is not relevant in the current context.
Partial or complete abatement of an adverse event after decrease or change in dose, or withdrawal of the product/drug.
No information regarding the outcome of decreasing the dose or discontinuation of the product/drug.
